snippet: Lawyers for James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people in a movie theater, changed his plea on Monday from not guilty to not guilty by reason of insanity.
abstract: Lawyers for James E Holmes, suspect accused of fatally shooting 12 people in Aurora, Colo, movie theater, say mental health experts who have evaluated Holmes offer evidence that bolsters insanity plea in case.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people in a movie theater, changed his plea on Monday from not guilty to not guilty by reason of insanity.

headline.seo: Colorado Shootings Suspect Enters Insanity Plea
headline.main: Mental Evaluations Endorse Insanity Plea in Colorado Shootings, Defense Says
headline.print_headline: New Plea Of Insanity In Shooting In Colorado
